w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Popover and tooltip
Basic usage
w:HTMLPanel.p: A Popover or a Tooltip contains only one widget.
Use the text property to set the popover / tooltip content, and the title property to set the popover title.
Use the placement property to set the popover / tooltip position (default is set to TOP).

w:Popover.title: Left popover
w:Popover.text: this is a popover on left
this is a popover on top without title

w:Popover.title: Bottom popover
w:Popover.text: this is a popover on bottom

w:Popover.title: Right popover
w:Popover.text: this is a popover on right

w:Tooltip.text: this is a tooltip on left
this is a tooltip on top
this is a tooltip on bottom
this is a tooltip on right

c:StaticCode.pre:
<w:Popover title="Left popover" text="this is a popover on left" placement="LEFT"> <w:Button text="Popover on left" /> </w:Popover> <w:Popover text="this is a popover on top without title"> <w:Button text="Popover on top" /> </w:Popover> <w:Popover title="Bottom popover" text="this is a popover on bottom" placement="BOTTOM"> <w:Button text="Popover on bottom" /> </w:Popover> <w:Popover title="Right popover" text="this is a popover on right" placement="RIGHT"> <w:Button text="Popover on right" /> </w:Popover>
<w:Tooltip text="this is a tooltip on left" placement="LEFT"> <w:Button text="Tooltip on left" /> </w:Tooltip> <w:Tooltip text="this is a tooltip on top"> <w:Button text="Tooltip on top" /> </w:Tooltip> <w:Tooltip text="this is a tooltip on bottom" placement="BOTTOM"> <w:Button text="Tooltip on bottom" /> </w:Tooltip> <w:Tooltip text="this is a tooltip on right" placement="RIGHT"> <w:Button text="Tooltip on right" /> </w:Tooltip>

w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Popover / tooltip trigger
w:HTMLPanel.p: Default behaviour is to trigger the popover / tooltip on mouse over. Use the trigger property to chose between HOVER, FOCUS or MANUAL trigger.

c:StaticCode.pre:
<w:Popover text="Popover on focus" placement="LEFT" trigger="FOCUS"> <w:Button text="Popover on focus" /> </w:Popover>
<w:Tooltip text="Tooltip on focus" placement="TOP" trigger="FOCUS"> <w:Button text="Tooltip on focus" /> </w:Tooltip>
<w:Popover ui:field="manualPopover" text="Popover Manual" placement="BOTTOM" trigger="MANUAL"> <w:Button ui:field="manualPopoverBtn" text="Click to toggle popover" /> </w:Popover>
<w:Tooltip ui:field="manualTooltip" text="Tooltip manual" placement="RIGHT" trigger="MANUAL"> <w:Button ui:field="manualTooltipBtn" text="Click to toggle tooltip" /> </w:Tooltip>
